Field Detail

INDEX_COLUMNS_CONF_KEY

public static final String INDEX_COLUMNS_CONF_KEY
Configuration key for defining column names to index in the DatasetSpecification properties. Multiple column names should be listed as a comma-separated string, e.g. "column1,column2,etc".

See Also:

Method Detail

configure

public DatasetSpecification configure(String instanceName,
                                      DatasetProperties properties)
Description copied from interface: DatasetDefinition
Configures new instance of the dataset.

Parameters:
instanceName - name of the instance
properties - instance configuration properties
Returns:
instance of DatasetSpecification that fully describes dataset instance. The DatasetSpecification can be used to create DatasetAdmin and Dataset to perform administrative and data operations respectively, see DatasetDefinition.getAdmin(DatasetSpecification, ClassLoader) and DatasetDefinition.getDataset(DatasetSpecification, Map, ClassLoader).

getAdmin

public DatasetAdmin getAdmin(DatasetSpecification spec,
                             ClassLoader classLoader)
                      throws IOException
Description copied from interface: DatasetDefinition
Provides dataset admin to be used to perform administrative operations on the dataset instance defined by passed DatasetSpecification.

Parameters:
spec - specification of the dataset instance.
classLoader - classloader to use when executing admin operations
Returns:
dataset admin to perform administrative operations
Throws:
IOException

getDataset

public IndexedTable getDataset(DatasetSpecification spec,
                               Map<String,String> arguments,
                               ClassLoader classLoader)
                        throws IOException
Description copied from interface: DatasetDefinition
Provides dataset to be used to perform data operations on the dataset instance data defined by passed DatasetSpecification and the given arguments.

Parameters:
spec - specification of the dataset instance.
arguments - arguments for this instance of the dataset. Should not be null - provide an empty map for no arguments.
classLoader - classloader to use when executing dataset operations
Returns:
dataset to perform object operations
Throws:
IOException
